TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebServiceBindingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebServiceBindingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebServiceBindingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 声明用于定义一个或多个 XML Web service 方法的绑定。

span.span: Declares a binding that defines one or more XML Web service methods.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义的绑定类似于接口, 因为它定义了一组具体的操作。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface, in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 每个 XML Web service 方法都是特定绑定中的一个操作。Each XML Web service method is an operation within a particular binding. XML Web service 方法是 XML Web service 的默认绑定的成员或在应用于实现 XML Web service 的类中指定的绑定的成员。XML Web service methods are members of either the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to a class implementing an XML Web service. XML Web service 可以通过将多个属性应用于 XML Web service 来实现多个绑定。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings, by applying multiple attributes to an XML Web service. 将一个或多个特性应用到 XML Web service 后 , 或可应用于单个 XML Web service 方法以指示特定 XML Web service 方法实现的绑定操作。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 设置或 的属性, 以指定 XML Web service 方法为其实现操作的绑定。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for. ## Examples 以下 XML Web service 实现来自四个绑定的操作。The following XML Web service implements operations from four bindings. 具体而言, XML Web service 通过向 XML Web service 应用三个属性, 为其实现操作的三个绑定。Specifically, the XML Web service declares three bindings it implements operations for, by applying three attributes to the XML Web service. 若要指定 XML Web service 方法为其实现操作的绑定, 请将应用于每个 XML Web service 方法, 但除外。 `DefaultBindingMethod`To specify which binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for, a is applied to each of the XML Web service methods, except `DefaultBindingMethod`. 通过不指定的绑定`DefaultBindingMethod`, 它将在 XML Web service 的默认绑定上实现操作。By not specifying a binding for `DefaultBindingMethod`, it is implementing an operation on the default binding for the XML Web service. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 通过设置 XML Web service 方法实现的绑定的名称，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class setting the name of the binding the XML Web service method is implementing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于指定 XML Web service 中定义的绑定的名称, 该名称是默认命名空间的成员。This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding defined in the XML Web service it is applied to and is a member of the default namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例指定了一个名`LocalBinding`为的绑定, 该`BindingSample`绑定在 XML Web service 中定义。The following example specifies a binding named `LocalBinding` that is defined in the `BindingSample` XML Web service. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于指定 XML Web service 中定义的绑定的名称, 该绑定是所提供命名空间的成员。This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding defined in the XML Web service it is applied to that and is a member of the supplied namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例指定一个名`LocalBindingNonDefaultNamespace`为的绑定, 它是`http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` `BindingSample`命名空间的成员, 并在 XML Web service 中定义。The following example specifies a binding named `LocalBindingNonDefaultNamespace` that is a member of the `http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` namespace and defined in the `BindingSample` XML Web service. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于指定未在 XML Web service 中定义的绑定的名称, 该名称是所提供命名空间的成员。This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding not defined in the XML Web service it is applied to that and is a member of the supplied namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例指定一个名`RemoteBinding`为的绑定, 它是`http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding`命名空间的成员, `http://www.contoso.com/MyService.asmx?wsdl`并在中定义。The following example specifies a binding named `RemoteBinding` that is a member of the `http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` namespace and defined at `http://www.contoso.com/MyService.asmx?wsdl`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::WsiProfiles ConformsTo { System::Web::Services::WsiProfiles get(); void set(System::Web::Services::WsiProfiles value); };
member this.ConformsTo : System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置绑定声称所符合的 Web 服务互操作性 (WSI) 规范。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which the binding claims to conform.

value.span: 值之一，指示 WSI 规范。

span.span: One of the values, indicating a WSI specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-I 组织发布了指导原则, 以确保 Web 服务跨平台的互操作性。The WS-I organization publishes guidelines to ensure the interoperability of Web services across platforms. 此属性指示绑定声明要遵从的 WSI 规范。This property indicates the WSI specification to which the binding claims to conform. 属性控制在发布 Web 服务的 WSDL 说明时是否提供一致性声明。The property controls whether the conformance claims are provided when a WSDL description of the Web service is published.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EmitConformanceClaims { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EmitConformanceClaims : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示绑定是否发出符合性声称。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the binding emits conformance claims.

value.span: 如果绑定发出一致性声称，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the binding emits conformance claims; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值控制在发布 Web 服务的 WSDL 说明时是否提供由属性表示的一致性声明。The value of this property controls whether the conformance claims expressed by the property are provided when a WSDL description of the Web service is published.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Location { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Location : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置定义绑定的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location where the binding is defined.
The location where the binding is defined.

value.span: 默认为此特性应用到的 XML Web services 的 URL。

span.span: The default is the URL of the XML Web service to which the attribute is applied.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例指定一个名`RemoteBinding`为的绑定, 它是`http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding`命名空间的成员, `http://www.contoso.com/MyService.asmx?wsdl`并在中定义。The following example specifies a binding named `RemoteBinding` that is a member of the `http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` namespace and defined at `http://www.contoso.com/MyService.asmx?wsdl`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Location Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Location Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Location Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.Location Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置绑定的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the binding.
The name of the binding.

value.span: 默认为追加了“Soap”的 XML Web services 名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例指定了一个名`LocalBinding`为的绑定, 该`BindingSample`绑定在 XML Web service 中定义。The following example specifies a binding named `LocalBinding` that is defined in the `BindingSample` XML Web service. summary.span: 获取或设置与绑定关联的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace associated with the binding.
The namespace for the binding.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例指定一个名`LocalBindingNonDefaultNamespace`为的绑定, 它是`http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` `BindingSample`命名空间的成员, 并在 XML Web service 中定义。The following example specifies a binding named `LocalBindingNonDefaultNamespace` that is a member of the `http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` namespace and defined in the `BindingSample` XML Web service.
